details.about: Anu Chugh Shah is an extremely popular makeup artist. She believes in giving her clients a fantastic makeover and ensuring that they look stunning on their wedding day. Her style focuses on offering her clients a natural and elegant metamorphosis by accentuating their characteristics and not overdoing the makeup, giving them a once-in-a-lifetime experience. She is an excellent choice for your wedding makeup and hair, as well as evening formal, day events, and party cosmetics. Services Provided: Makeup for Brides Hairstyling and Makeup for a Party Makeup for an Engagement. Their team of experts does arrangements for their client’s specific desires and visions, helping to ensure that their wedding is everything they hoped for. They work with various price points without compromising service quality to serve a diverse core audience. They have been doing this work for a very long time and hence have a lot of experience.

Disha is a professional make-up artist working in and around Bangalore and specialises in Bridal makeup. She believes in striving to understand the client requirements, as each bride is unique and wants to look gorgeous & nonchalant on her wedding day. She tries to incorporate her client's personality & character in her transformation and never imposes her personal style on them. She has mastered the art of giving a natural and elegant transformation by enhancing the features and not going overboard with makeup, giving cherishable memories for the lifetime. Disha is the perfect choice for pre-wedding functions like sangeet and cocktail as well as for the wedding day.
Sweta of  Makeup by Sweta Pradhan is a certified Korean and Indian Makeup Artist with 8+Years of Experience.

Based in Bangalore, Makeup with Varsha is a professional hair & makeup artist. She believes in giving her clients a stunning makeover, and makes them look like a dream on their wedding day. Her style is focused on giving a natural and elegant transformation by enhancing the features and not going overboard with makeup of her clients, giving them an experience worthy of a lifetime. Offering bridal makeup and hair, evening formal, day events and party makeup, she is an ideal choice for your wedding.  It is a place where you will get all your beauty solutions. Be ready for a complete bridal makeover right from the first visit. The quality offered by them is one of the best in the business. They extend their services to both the brides and their families. Makeup with Varsha uses only the best techniques in makeup and hair for transformations to help you look stunning. From glamorous looks for the reception to the classic, sophisticated look for the wedding day, they focus on presenting the best version of the bride. Their style is focused on giving a natural and elegant transformation for the brides by enhancing the features and not going overboard with makeup, giving them an experience worthy of a lifetime. Choosing a Makeup Artist on your wedding is one of the most important decisions of a bride’s special day. A bride should look all angelic and beautiful on her wedding day and who better than a good makeup artist to give you all the princess feels. To look the best on your wedding and pre wedding functions, the right makeup artist can give you all that you need and desire for. From bridal makeup to hairstyling, you can leave all your worries to them and relax. Book them now as they are perfect for any kind of  natural makeup and wedding, cocktail or reception makeover and they travel to your venue as well.

I was always interested in makeup, but my mom wanted me to complete my education and work in a corporate job. As she wished I completed my MBA and worked in a corporate”.

One peculiar thing which bothers a lot of people while finally deciding upon their makeup service provider is the fact that it is mostly the assistants who do the final makeup. Now, assistants aren’t really a concern, the concern is that one cannot be sure about how well they have been trained. Also, even the makeup service owner, there is no surety of their calibre as well- it is just that they have been in service for a while and people have visited them, posted good reviews too maybe or they are just supposed to be the best in the local area. But, does that guarantee that the work done by them will be up to the satisfaction. Azmi Glitz Makeup Artistry based out of Bangalore is the perfect answer to all such concerns.
